simpleTaxonomy 0.0.0.9033

Enrich a Taxonomy File with URLs to Wikipedia-Images

Source: R/images.R
enrich_taxonomy_with_images.Rd

Add URLs to Images from Wikipedia to a file with a taxonomic hierarchy. By default, existing URLs are kept and only missing URLs are filled in.

Usage

enrich_taxonomy_with_images(
  file,
  delim = ",",
  retry = FALSE,
  progress = TRUE,
  quiet = FALSE
)

Arguments

file

path to the csv file

delim

the delimiter used in the file

retry

Whether to retry images that have not been found previously.

progress

Whether to show a progress bar.

quiet

Should all output be suppressed?

Value

a taxonomy_graph with added image URLs. The file given by file is overwritten as a side effect.
